issue.title: Add packages to provisioning of constellation

content.raw:
The following is a list of packages that we install with our install script:

```ros-fuerte-arm-navigation
              ros-fuerte-desktop-full
              ros-fuerte-documentation
              ros-fuerte-laser-drivers
              ros-fuerte-multimaster-experimental
              ros-fuerte-pr2-arm-navigation
              ros-fuerte-pr2-controllers
              ros-fuerte-pr2-simulator
              ros-fuerte-pr2-navigation-apps
              ros-fuerte-linux-networking
              ros-fuerte-console-bridge
              ros-fuerte-urdfdom
              ros-fuerte-urdfdom-headers
              ros-fuerte-navigation-experimental
              drcsim
git 
                  subversion 
                  mercurial
                  python-pip
                  libgtkglext1-dev 
                  libdc1394-22-dev 
                  python-cvxopt 
                  python-scipy
                  libgles1-mesa 
                  libgles2-mesa 
                  libopenal1 
                  libopencv-highgui2.4 
                  python-pmw
                  libosmesa6 
                  libxxf86dga-dev
                  build-essential 
                  libtinyxml-dev 
                  libtbb-dev 
                  libxml2-dev 
                  libqt4-dev 
                  pkg-config  
                  libprotoc-dev 
                  libfreeimage-dev 
                  libprotobuf-dev 
                  protobuf-compiler 
                  libboost-all-dev 
                  freeglut3-dev 
                  cmake 
                  libogre-dev 
                  libtar-dev 
                  libcurl4-openssl-dev
                  liblapack-dev
                  meshlab
                  libegl1-mesa 
                  libegl1-mesa-drivers 
                  libgbm1 
                  libopenvg1-mesa 
                  libwayland0
                  libxcb-xfixes0
                  libenet-dev
                  libglpk-dev ```

We actually won't need all of those for the field computer machines but it wouldn't hurt to have them on there. If necessary I can attempt to trim it down if you would prefer  to have a more minimal install.
content.html:
The following is a list of packages that we install with our install script:

ros-fuerte-arm-navigation ros-fuerte-desktop-full ros-fuerte-documentation ros-fuerte-laser-drivers ros-fuerte-multimaster-experimental ros-fuerte-pr2-arm-navigation ros-fuerte-pr2-controllers ros-fuerte-pr2-simulator ros-fuerte-pr2-navigation-apps ros-fuerte-linux-networking ros-fuerte-console-bridge ros-fuerte-urdfdom ros-fuerte-urdfdom-headers ros-fuerte-navigation-experimental drcsim git subversion mercurial python-pip libgtkglext1-dev libdc1394-22-dev python-cvxopt python-scipy libgles1-mesa libgles2-mesa libopenal1 libopencv-highgui2.4 python-pmw libosmesa6 libxxf86dga-dev build-essential libtinyxml-dev libtbb-dev libxml2-dev libqt4-dev pkg-config libprotoc-dev libfreeimage-dev libprotobuf-dev protobuf-compiler libboost-all-dev freeglut3-dev cmake libogre-dev libtar-dev libcurl4-openssl-dev liblapack-dev meshlab libegl1-mesa libegl1-mesa-drivers libgbm1 libopenvg1-mesa libwayland0 libxcb-xfixes0 libenet-dev libglpk-dev

We actually won't need all of those for the field computer machines but it wouldn't hurt to have them on there. If necessary I can attempt to trim it down if you would prefer to have a more minimal install.
